hr00.gn: You were born to lead a dramatic life, and your greatest joy is to be of service to people around you. You are not concerned with the material side of life, choosing instead to focus on the spiritual and to try and make the world a better place. You are open and honest and people are drawn to your charm and magnetism. You have a commanding presence in a crowd which also draws people to you and makes you a perfect leader. You care about the feelings of others and like to focus on helping each person that you can. You feel deep compassion for the people suffering in the world and you want to use your life to try and solve the problems you see. You work hard and have a hard time with relationships because you have difficulty balancing your work life with your personal life.

hr01.gn: You are creative and come up with highly original thoughts, ideas, or creations. You are talented at art of inventing new items that are necessary for the world. You follow your own path instead of walking the path of those before you. You are ambitious and assertive and need to make sure that you aren't too self-centered. People enjoy being around you and find you enjoyable to talk to and to hang around with. You were born to be a leader and find that you have a great talent at taking charge of almost any situation. You have difficulty following the lead of others, both because you prefer to be in charge and because you tend to see things differently from those around you.

hr02.gn: You were born to be a visionary, as you are an idealist and very intuitive. You see things different from most people, and you have the ability to be a peacekeeper for others around you. Your personality is geared to making everyone around you happy and comfortable, and they rely on your presence to solve problems. You are the ideal mediator and you have the knack for helping people see different points of view, which enables them to compromise. You rarely take the attention for yourself; instead you enjoy watching people around you enjoying the limelight. You work better in the background, and you prefer to live a life of habit and routine. These things give you comfort and help you control your tendencies to anxiety and nervousness.

hr03.gn: You were born to be an orator and you are very creative in using words to persuade people to your opinions and ideas. You love to entertain people with your wit and personality and people are drawn to your charm. You enjoy boisterous social situations and can be the life of the party. You do, however, still like your quiet time and relish time spent by yourself contemplating life. You are very conscious of other people's emotions because you too are sensitive to criticism and have no desire to hurt others. An eternal optimist, you thrive on your ability to inspire others. You are loyal and caring and would never think of cheating or hurting those you love. You love to live in the now and need to make sure that you don't wander through life without a sense of purpose.

hr04.gn: You were born to see your plans through to their completion, as you have the determination to finish anything you can envision. You are creative and idealistic and can see how to solve many problems in life. You will need to choose what area you want to focus your time and energy on, or you risk spreading yourself too thin because you do not want to give up on any project. People can think that you are stubborn, and you have a tendency to be narrow-minded and close-minded to other's ideas. Be careful not to dismiss other people because you feel like only you know best because other people have great ideas too. Your greatest strengths lie in your ability to plan and organize, but it makes it hard for you to be spontaneous. You are loving and devoted and feel that family is the most important thing in your life.

hr05.gn: You were born to value freedom and you hate being tied down by anything, including routine and the needs of others. You are a free-spirit and free-thinker and are always looking for your next adventure. You have many of the attributes of a risk-taker, and you need to learn to temper this tendency or risk getting into a lot of trouble. All routine tasks are difficult for you and therefore financial planning and household chores are very difficult for you. You can do almost anything you set your mind to, but because of your impulsiveness, you must work hard to see things through to their completion. You need to be careful in your relationships because being restricted is difficult for you and a single lover may tie you down too much. You need to learn to focus on planning for your future, as this is difficult for someone who wants to live in the moment.

hr06.gn: You were born to be a nurturer, and your ideal is to spend your life caring for the needs of others. Your most important ideal is to be of use to others, and you hate to have idle hands. You are a hard worker and love to take care of others, and you function by focusing on your compassion for others. Your greatest gifts are your wisdom and the ability to balance all areas of your life smoothly and easily. You need to make sure not to take on too much and to control the guilt you will feel when you do decide to say no. Because you are a selfless person, people may have a tendency to take advantage of you if you aren't carefull. Your ultimate goal in life is to make a happy home and serve the needs of your family and friends. These are the things that make you happiest.

hr07.gn: You are a born thinker and enjoy the peace and solitude of your own company rather than the excitement of life. As a thinker, you enjoy observing the workings of your own mind and struggle in crowds. You love to analyze problems and tend to be a perfectionist, which can put some people off. However, all your work is thorough and complete and you pride yourself on your high standards. Because you prefer to spend time alone, you can be selfish and spoiled and you prefer to live alone, making any relationship difficulty for you. You are peaceful and affectionate, but you are careful about giving your affections to others. You are slow to accept people into your circle of friends and you tend to have a few close friends rather than a large group of people surrounding you.

hr08.gn: You were born to be a leader and you work hard to make your dreams come true. You have a tendency to spend too much energy on work and not enough energy on your home life, and can upset your loved ones due to the lack of attention you show them. However, you do care deeply for the people around you and show it by providing them with a comfortable lifestyle. Your greatest desire is for material wealth and status. Make sure to guard against being too demanding and dictatorial or you will just crush the spirit of the people you are trying to lead. You need to be mindful of the feelings of others because this is not your natural state and you don't want to drive important people away from you. You are analytical and a perfectionist and you expect the best out of yourself at all times and have difficulty dealing with failure.

hr09.gn: You were born to be a leader in humanitarian areas, and people value you for your compassion and devotion to helping others. You tend to take the lead in whatever situation you are involved in because people are drawn to your openness and your charming personality and naturally want to follow you. You have a lot of friends and tend to make many friends easily because people enjoy your presence. However, you work too hard and have difficulty being in relationships because they are not your priority in life. Instead, your focus is on your efforts to make the world a better place and you care deeply for people who have less than you do. You are generous to a fault and would rather give away what you have than to keep it for yourself. Material possessions are not your concern. You are very sensitive to what others say and need to guard against other people hurting you.

hr10.gn: You were born to come up with new and creative ideas to solve the world's problems. You are inventive and forward thinking, and others rely on your solutions to solve many problems. People are drawn to you, and they enjoy you because you are fun and interesting and a great conversationalist. You are careful about what you say to others, as you are very sensitive to criticism. You prefer to have your own way and make a much better leader than a follower. If you cannot lead, you will go off on your own, and you do not want to be too dependent on those around you. You have a strong personality and you exert your strength both physically and mentally by displaying determination and grit.

hr11.gn: You were born to be helpful to those around you and to make the world a better place. Your personality does not allow for personal glory; instead, you enjoy giving attention to others and helping them achieves their goals. You are shy in expressing your own feelings and desires, and do not want to upset those around you by telling them you are unhappy with something. You keep your personal feelings to yourself and will not admit that you sometimes suffer from anxiety and indecisiveness. You are also sometimes oversensitive and need to learn to take the words of others with a grain of salt. Do not allow yourself to feel negative about things, or you will be overcome with feelings of apathy and lethargy and will have difficulty motivating yourself to do the work you need.

hr12.gn: You were born to connect with others, and you love to be the center of attention. You would do best to work in a field that allows you to enlighten and entertain others, such as public speaker or actor. You have a gift of words and enjoy informing others with your creative speeches and beautiful words. People are wowed by your bright, optimistic personality, and your exuberance will take you far because everyone wants to help you. You love to live in the moment, but because of this you have difficulty making long term plans. You must watch out to make sure that you do not wander aimlessly through life if you cannot come up with goals to focus your attention. You love to live each day to its fullest and are always looking for bigger and more exciting opportunities.

hr13.gn: You were born to be a thinker and a creator, and your best skills come from being able to organize and plan almost anything. You are an idealist who can see both the big picture for creating a better future and can do the meticulous work involved in creating it. You love doing things your own way because you think it's the best way and you make a great entrepreneur. You have a tendency to be a perfectionist and have a difficult time letting go of even the smallest detail. Some people may call you stubborn but that is only because you are determined to see everything you start through to its conclusion. You are well-grounded and understand the practical side of life, so you are great with planning and with financial concerns. Be careful to ward against being dogmatic and narrow-minded.

hr14.gn: You are a natural born salesperson and people are attracted to your charm and charisma. You tire easily of routine and instead look for as much adventure you can get every day. This makes you a risk-taker, which can get you into a lot of trouble if you are not careful. Your impulsive nature makes it hard to plan for the future as you are more interested in enjoying today. You do not do well in long-term relationships as you hate to be tied down by another and you definitely have a problem with anyone who is too needy or demanding of you. Your main motivation of life is to find the answers to all of life's questions, and your insatiable curiosity serves you best here. You are a trailblazer and love to try new things and people enjoy following your lead as you have the skill to motivate others.

hr15.gn: You were born to be of service to others and you are happiest when you are using your skills to be a caretaker for those who mean most to you. You are always there when people need you, and you need to make sure to not take on too much and become completely overwhelmed. It is important that you learn to take care of your own needs as well as the needs of others. You have a strong sense of compassion for others and feel that your life purpose is to take care of others. You lead by example and inspire through your actions rather than your words. People rely on your compassion and your wisdom to carry them through hard times and you love to give them advice when needed. Guard against people taking advantage of you, as it is very possible with your giving nature and some you encounter may not be as selfless as you.

hr16.gn: You were born to be a bit of a loner, and you prefer your own company over the company of others. You have a few close friends and are very selective about the people you allow into your inner circle and you prefer to live alone. Because you enjoy your own company over the company of others, you have to guard against the tendency toward selfishness. You have difficulty dealing with the hustle and bustle of modern life, and prefer a life of quiet away from the city. You are a thinker with an eye for observation and you tend to notice all the small details in the world around you. You tend to follow your own intuition rather than rely on the advice of others. You love to observe the workings of your own mind and are a great thinker. You need to figure things out for yourself and enjoy the discovery.

hr17.gn: You were born to succeed, and your drive and desire for status and material objects has served you well in this life. Being successful and admired are the more important things in your life. You tend to be a workaholic who is more concerned about your work life rather than the people close to you. When you find people to care about, you have difficulty showing them and would rather buy things than offer your time and attention. You have a knack for judging other people's character and especially for recognizing the hard work of those around you. You tend to speak your mind, and people can find your frank, honest assessment of things to be a little disconcerting. Make sure to be mindful to think of other people as important, rather than just as tools to get to where you want to be.

hr18.gn: You were born to be of assistance to others, and you care very little for your own material gain. You want to be in front of the pack and you are a natural leader because people are drawn to your caring and charismatic personality. People love to be around you and you make friends easily, although you struggle with intimate relationships. You work too hard and don't make enough time for other things in your life, including your loved ones. Sometimes you have difficulties keeping going because it can be hard to be selfless all the time. You love to express yourself creatively and need to find an outlet for your feelings in activities such as painting, writing, or music. People find you honorable and trustworthy and you return this trust by feeling compelled to help people less fortunate than you. Your life goal is to leave the world a better place than you found it.

hr19.gn: You are a born leader and other people are drawn to you because of your good-natured tendencies and your ability to come up with creative solutions to problems. You have difficulty being a follower, difficulty with routine, and difficulty with detail-oriented tasks. Instead, you are an innovator and love coming up with new and creative solutions to all kinds of problems. You have an independent streak that cannot be tamed and prefer your own company to the company of those who feel superior to you. You possess a great deal of enthusiasm and the drive to complete any task you set your heart on. You thrive on confronting problems and obstacles, and you have the determination to overcome any issue you encounter.

hr20.gn: You were born to help other people solve problems and mediate disputes. You do not enjoy being the center of attention; instead you want to fade into the background and help those around you get the attention they deserve. You love routine and habit, and do best following a path that was well trodden by those who came before you. You are spiritual and a visionary, but do not want to be the center of attention and will often allow others to take credit for your work. You are the ultimate team player and never look for glory for yourself. Because you have an intuitive understanding of the world around you, people value your opinions and ideas. You have the ability to assist others in solving their problems and coming up with compromises to any disputed issue. You enjoy the feeling of helping those around you.

hr21.gn: You were born to encourage and persuade others, and you love to be the center of attention. You have a gifted tongue and know what to say in any situation, and people feel at ease around you because of this. The most important things in your life are beauty, harmony, and pleasure and you love to share these things with those around you. You are warm and friendly and people are drawn to you and love to engage you in any social situation. However, you do need some downtime to recharge your batteries, and if you ignore this need, you will be difficult to be around. You suffer from being oversensitive and need to guard against negative comments. Because of this, you are very sensitive to the feelings of others and do what you can to protect their feelings.

hr22.gn: You were born to work with both your mind and your hands and love to create new things. You have the skills to conceive of new creations and inventions and then build them yourself. You enjoy seeing plans through to completion and you don't let anything get in the way of finishing what you have started. People something think you are stubborn, but instead you see yourself as determined. Your knack for planning and organizing leads you well in life, but it makes it difficult for you to be spontaneous or to fly by the seat of your pants. Anything that is not perfectly planned out makes you very uncomfortable. People find you to be loving and devoted, and you would never do anything to hurt those who are closest to you.

hr23.gn: You were born to find adventure and to be a risk-taker. You have difficulty with routine and find yourself bored too easily with everyday tasks such as housekeeping and money management. You will do best to find a job that allows you to search for adventure and to inspire people. Others find you intriguing and charismatic and you know how to motivate them or to persuade them to your side. Your biggest desire in life is to have your freedom and you tend to live in the moment and not think about tomorrow. This is also true in your relationships and you don't like to be tied down by a single lover or family as these things restrict your freewheeling tendencies. You can think things through and have a complex, analytical mind when you choose to focus it on a single task.

min0.gn: You are sensitive and compassionate and feel as if you are born to help people who are less fortunate than you. You are drawn to work for the betterment of people around you, and people admire your compassion and your charisma. However, you can find it that sometimes the weight of the world is on your shoulders and you need to be sure to balance the challenges you face with the need to take care of yourself. You are sensitive and creative and need to find an outlet for the visions you have and would do well to take up an art form that allows you to do so. You make friends easily and people are naturally drawn to you. However, you struggle to make close attachments the main focus in your life. You need to learn to balance your work life with your personal life. You need to find a partner that has the same altruistic makeup as you because if you find yourself attached to someone with material aspirations, you will have issues in your relationship.

min1.gn: You are an innovator and love to start new projects and try something exciting and different. You love to confront obstacles and are at your best when you are tacking a problem or issue that has come up in your work. Your personality is nonconformist, and you enjoy doing your own thing, rather than follow the crowd. This makes you a better leader than a follower, and people are drawn to you because of your energy and creativity. You have difficulty when you cannot be in charge and make a poor follower. You would rather be on your own than allow someone else to take the lead. You get bored with repetitive tasks easily and you always are looking for new and exciting things to keep your attention.

min2.gn: You sometimes feel in touch with forces greater than yourself and this world. You are a peaceful person and make a great diplomat, mediator, or peacekeeper. You have the ability to find common ground in contentious situations. However, you need to learn to control your tendencies for anxiety and indecisiveness or you will sabotage your own efforts. This energy can make your easygoing nature turn into emotional explosiveness if you do not learn to control it. You tend to flights of fancy and some people find that you have difficulty staying grounded. You have difficulty functioning well in a competitive environment and will do best to work in places where cooperation and teamwork are valued. Your life is based on the idea of service to others and the need to make the world a better place for those around you.

min3.gn: You easily connect with people around you, and you love to be the center of attention and become involved in as many social situations as possible. You are sensitive to what others have to say about you and because of this you are also very conscious of the feelings of others. You love to live in the moment and can be the life of any party. However, if you aren't careful, you will lose sight of a greater purpose because today is always more interesting than tomorrow. Although you love to be around people, you need to take time alone to recharge your battery or risk becoming irritable and angry. You have difficulty settling on one path because you desire to do so many things in your life. Make sure to spend some time on important things or your life will be filled with only the superficial and unimportant.

min4.gn: You are a very good organizer and planner, and everything in your life is meticulously planned out to the smallest detail. You have difficulty letting go of things and doing things spontaneously and you fear the uncertainty that can happen if you don't have everything arranged in advance. You are a loyal and devoted person and think it is important to put your family above everything else in your life. People sometimes think that you are stubborn, but you know you are just devoted, and once you make up your mind to do something you see it through to completion. You are an idealist, but you also know what kind of work goes into making your dreams and plans come true. You have the devotion to see all these plans through and people look up to you because of your determination.

min5.gn: You value your freedom and love to find adventure in every day you are alive. You hate routine and need to find ways to live that allow for your adventure-seeking and risk-taking behaviors. You don't do well with everyday tasks and should find others to manage household and financial tasks as you don't want to waste your time on routine things. You find that you love travel and trying as many new activities as you can, and you don't want to be tied down to anything. You are unrestrained and say and do what you feel without any concept of the consequences of these actions. Make sure to let anyone you enter into a relationship know that you prefer to be free and you do not do well to date someone who is demanding or high maintenance. You love to be involved in many different activities and find it important to try as much as you can.

sec0.gn: Your personality is caring and compassionate and your biggest desire is to leave the world a better place than you found it. You are very generous and need to temper that tendency or you may even give the shirt right off your back. It can be difficult to be selfless all the time, and occasionally you find it difficult and want to run away. You have difficulty believing that a life of selflessness can give your life a purpose without a level of personal ambition. People love to be around you and are willing to follow you anywhere. They are attracted to your compassion and your openness. They find you kind and loving and are drawn to this energy. You are deeply emotional and you need to find an outlet for everything that you feel, so spending some time on the arts are fulfilling.

sec1.gn: Your personality is assertive and ambitious, and you have to learn to temper these tendencies to keep people on your side. You make a great leader and people are naturally attracted to your creative vision and authoritative stance. You were born to follow your own path and you have no desire to walk in someone else's footsteps. You take charge of as many situations as you can, which can sometimes get you in trouble if it is the appropriate place and time for your leadership. People find you generally friendly and good natures and they enjoy your company. You have many talents and enjoy learning new things and applying new concepts to your creative and innovative pursuits. You possess creativity and enthusiasm to try new things and to come up to new solutions to many problems.

sec2.gn: You can do wonderfully well as a peacemaker and a diplomat. You possess the ability to bring people together and to come up with solutions to problems that make all people involved happy with compromise. Your life is meant to be given to the service of others, and you care about other people's happiness, even before your own. Your personality is in touch with the spiritual realms which put you in touch with forces you cannot see, but can definitely feel. Others around you feel that you are in touch with something greater than humanity and are drawn to you because of these peaceful feelings. You must guard against being too oversensitive to situations and expressing your anger when you feel yourself or others have been wronged. You need to learn to control your nervous energy and your feelings of uneasiness to be of service to the world around you.

sec3.gn: You easily connect with people around you, and you love to be the center of attention and become involved in as many social situations as possible. You are sensitive to what others have to say about you and because of this you are also very conscious of the feelings of others. You love to live in the moment and can be the life of any party. However, if you aren't careful, you will lose sight of a greater purpose because today is always more interesting than tomorrow. Although you love to be around people, you need to take time alone to recharge your battery or risk becoming irritable and angry. You have difficulty settling on one path because you desire to do so many things in your life. Make sure to spend some time on important things or your life will be filled with only the superficial and unimportant.

sec4.gn: You are a deep thinking intellectual and can easily solve problems. You have a knack for planning, fixing, and building things are do well with your hands. You use your intellect to solve problems and use your hands to implement the solutions you create. You are practical and down to earth and everyone relies on you for ideas and opinions. You are a patient person and very loving and devoted to those around you. You would gladly give everything you have to the people you care about. You understand that life is about determination and persistence and you possess both, which can make some people think you are stubborn. Instead you are steadfast and will follow through on any decision you make to its end. Your personality leads you to be a meticulous planner and you have difficulty letting go or doing something spontaneous.

sec5.gn: You love to investigate life and the answers to all the important questions. You are a seeker and love to explore new lands and new experiences. You despise being tied down, to people tasks, or routines. People are drawn to your charisma, and you make a great salesperson and are able to convince people to do whatever you want of them. Make sure to guard against using people for the wrong reasons. Adventure dominates your life, and people see you as a risk-taker and a trail blazer. You have more difficulty managing the day to day affairs of life and need to purposely focus your attention on doing so, as typical tasks do not come easily. You are compassionate and care about other people and use your abilities to give as many people freedom as possible. You find that the best way to live life is to live in freedom and you pass that ideal on to those around you.

sec6.gn: You love to investigate life and the answers to all the important questions. You are a seeker and love to explore new lands and new experiences. You despise being tied down, to people tasks, or routines. People are drawn to your charisma, and you make a great salesperson and are able to convince people to do whatever you want of them. You find that the best way to live life is to live in freedom and you pass that ideal on to those around you.
